author: Yeji Jesse Lee and Lydia Ramsey
title: A coronavirus patient thought he was recovering. Then doctors found blood clots in his lungs — a new and potentially deadly complication of the virus.
description:
• Doctors are finding blood clots in the lungs, heart, and kidneys of coronavirus patients, some of whom are critically ill and others who seem relatively stable.
  • Blood clots can travel and create blockages in veins, which could lead to stroke…
content:
More than 2 million people around the world have been infected with the novel coronavirus, but there's still a lot we don't know about how the disease affects the human body.
Respiratory issues are one of the key symptoms of infection, but other complication… [+5477 chars]
